TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Bacingul, title = Bacingul, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bacingul} }

S.FORM: Bacingul Itiniay i Haiduan Cen no Taitung ko Bacingul a niyaro', 67 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 274 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 96% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 263 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 4% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 11 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Bunun 84%, Amis 1%, Puyuma1%, roma 9%.

Bacingol Itiniay i Haidoan Cen no Taitong ko Bacingol a niyaro', 67 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 274 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 96% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 263 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 4% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 11 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Bonon 84%, Amis 1%, Poyoma1%, roma 9%.
